commit message: Added tag 0.5.36 for changeset b46208731bd3
Fix genFAQ.py script
Fix stupid bug in naming native library (fixes 4.1)
Tag version 0.5.36a
Fix tls-cipher when invalid ciphers are given
Add external API with security.
Registering for a state receiver gets the most recent state. Also added the coarse state to the interface.
Allow clearing of external apps
Fix status updates
Remove tls-remote conversion. Let Heiko's patches handle this stuff
add LastConnectedUuid to state messages.

Do not close main window when starting a VPN Connection.

I am not sure why I did that in the first place.

Always log tun information

I tired of bug reports without this information. Also this removes one of the unclear buttons in the Logwindow
Add Swedish!
Remove unused string, update logmenu
Add states when requiring user input
Fix NPE when calling disconnect() without being connected

Add the information that Android will keep using proxies when having no DNS server specified (closes issue #161)

--HG--
extra : rebase_source : 99047ef45106d9884e9f9b09e8fe117ba23da597

Switch license to GPLv2.\nI am annoyed of people modifying my code, breaking and then ask me for help on their commercial product for free...
